alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 1:18PM CST until January 16 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. For the Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 degrees expected. * WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands, Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Tuesday. For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands
